DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study ETC-1002 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Major Healthy male female subject nonchild bear potential determined medical history , physical exam vial sign measurement Body Mass Index 1832 kg/m2 inclusive body weight > 50 kg Major Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > 1.2 x Upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) , serum creatinine > ULN , Hemoglobin < 12.0 g/dL Clinically significant disease require physician 's care and/or would interfere study evaluation History drug alcohol abuse , consumption alcohol within 48 hour prior randomization , positive test alcohol drug high potential abuse prior randomization Use prescription nonprescription drug , vitamin , dietary supplement within 14 day prior randomization Other exclusion criterion apply
